document_data.title: The Map with No Names
document_data.design: [[Jay Anderson]]{{Cite adventurers league/The Map with No Names|1}}
document_data.followed_by: ''[[Beneath the City of the Dead (module)|Beneath the City of the Dead]]''
document_data.mainbody:
'''''The Map with No Names''''' is an adventure module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 5{{th}} edition ruleset. It is part of the ''[[Adventurers League/Waterdeep|Waterdeep]]'' series of adventures published for the [[Adventurers League|D&D Adventurers League]]. It focuses on [[Waterdeep]], and is an adventure designed for 1{{st}}- to 4{{th}}-level characters. It is part one of the ''Umbral Aristocracy'' Trilogy.

{{Quote|''Rumors abound of a [[map]] that leads to a treasure of unimaginable value. When chance drops the map into your hands, you have the chance to become wealthy beyond your wildest dreams. But you’re not the only ones with that dream. The chase is on.''|}}

Locations.Streets & Neighborhoods: {{P|[[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]]|7}} • {{P|[[Waterdeep/City of the Dead|City of the Dead]]|5,10}} • {{P|[[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]]|5,8}} • {{P|[[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward / Northern Ward]]|5,7}} • {{P|[[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]]|5,9}} • {{P|[[Three Daggers Alley]]|5-6,8}} • {{P|[[Trollskull Alley]]|2,5-7,19}}

Magic.Spells: {{P|''[[antimagic field]]''|14}} • {{P|''[[counterspell]]''|14}} • {{P|''[[crown of madness]]''|14}} • {{P|''[[dispel magic]]''|14}} • {{P|''[[Enlarge/reduce|enlarge]]''|13}} • {{P|''[[glyph of warding]]''|20}} • {{P|''[[hypnotic pattern]]''|14}} • {{P|''[[identify]]''|20}} • {{P|''[[invisibility]]''|13,20}} • ''[[lesser restoration]]'' • {{P|''[[locate object]]''|20}} • {{P|''[[mage armor]]''|20}} • {{P|''[[magic missile]]''|20}} • {{P|''[[rope trick]]''|20}} • {{P|''[[snare]]''|20}} • {{P|''[[telekinesis]]''|14}}
